comments:
While trying to delete code in the Java Editor I got the following exception and
subsequently the workbench would not perform any tasks without giving the second
exception (IllegalStateException).

Unable to close the window I had to manually kill the process.  After reopening
the workbench everything went back to normal and I couldn't reproduce the bug.

 - Leo
